headline: ServiceTitan and Verisk Team Up to Bring Xactimate® to New Roofing and Exterior Contractors
summary: LOS ANGELES, Sept. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ServiceTitan (Nasdaq: TTAN), the software platform that powers the trades, is announcing a new collaboration with Verisk (Nasdaq: VRSK), a leading data analytics and technology provider to the global insurance industry, to connect Verisk’s Xactimate® solution for property claims management with the ServiceTitan platform. Geared towards trades businesses that handle insurance work, especially those in roofing and exteriors, this new collaboration wi
